705807f-a.text:
Myrtle Avenue, north side, east from North Orford Street, showing a continuous area in two views. View 1 extends to a point near Cumberland Street; view B begins in the center of the block, beginning with number 313, and runs east across Cumberland Street. All the buildings comprising the block from North Oxford to Cumberland Streets will be razed to make way for the erection of Fort Greene Houses, a low-rent municipal
housing center.
Dctober 13, 1940
Views 1,2
P. L. Sperr  Vi. 3 eS( 11, 15V

706073f-a.text:
North Oxford Street, east side, north from Myrtle Avenue, seen from uncerneath the Myrtle Avenue elevated structure. The buildings seen in this view were later torn down to make
way for the erection of Fort Greene Houses.
October 12, 1940
P. L. Sperr
